description: This file defines an asynchronous API router for a FastAPI application, handling endpoints related to a playground environment for agents, workflows, and teams. It includes functions for streaming responses, managing sessions, and CRUD operations for agents, workflows, and teams, with support for file processing and session management.

methods.name: chat_response_streamer
methods.description: Streams the response of an agent's chat interaction, handling exceptions and converting response chunks to JSON.

methods.name: agent_acontinue_run_streamer
methods.description: Streams the continuation response of an agent's run, handling exceptions and converting response chunks to JSON.

methods.name: team_chat_response_streamer
methods.description: Streams the response of a team's chat interaction, handling exceptions and converting response chunks to JSON.

methods.name: get_async_playground_router
methods.description: Creates and returns a FastAPI APIRouter with endpoints for managing agents, workflows, and teams within a playground environment, including session management, file processing, and response streaming.
